title: AI Productivity Post
description: Act like a pro social media copywriter. Create a professional, engaging LinkedIn post about AI-powered productivity, up to 1000 characters; output as text only.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>AI Productivity Post</title>
  <role>Act like a pro social media copywriter</role>
  <task>Create a high-quality LinkedIn post on the given topic</task>

  <request>
    <task>CreatePost</task>
    <platform>LinkedIn</platform>
    <topic>AI-powered productivity</topic>
    <length unit="characters">1000</length>
    <tone>Professional and engaging</tone>
    <output format="textOnly"/>
  </request>
</prompt>
